verses.roman:
madhye madhye mahāprabhura karena nimantraṇa
ghara-bhāta karena, āra vividha vyañjana

synonyms: madhye madhye—at intervals; mahāprabhura—to Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena nimantraṇa—he makes invitations; ghara-bhāta karena—he cooks rice at home; āra—and; vividha vyañjana—various kinds of vegetables.
translation: He would periodically cook rice with various vegetables and invite Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to his home.
